definitions: A nutrient-rich food considered to be especially beneficial for health and well-being.
A food (such as salmon, broccoli, or blueberries) that is rich in compounds (such as antioxidants, fiber, or fatty acids) considered to be beneficial to a person's health.
examples: Blueberries are often called a superfood.
Eating a variety of superfoods can improve your diet.
Many people incorporate superfoods into their daily meals.
